title: Throttle House's James & Thomas
description:
It's Thomas and James from Throttle House! This duo do high-quality car reviews, drag races, and comparisons. Their videos amass hundreds of thousands (if not millions of views) and their cold opens are legendary. 

We talk about how they got started; they're favorite cars; a CRAZY moment that happened during their Ford GT shoot; driving in Canada; the Rivian; the LFA; what true luxury is; and more! Check them out here. https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCyXiDU5qjfOPxgOPeFWGwKw 

Recorded on January 27, 2022 (Patrons got to hear this that day! Want the show early? Click below!)

Want to find the right parts for you car? Head to http://carparts.com/thesmokingtire and get 10% off a purchase of $100 or more. 

Find Valvoline now at your local auto parts store. 

Head to policygenius.com to get your free home and auto insurance quotes and see how much you could save.

Download the DraftKings Sportsbook app, use promo code TIRE, and get 56-1 odds on either team. Bet just $5 and get $280 in free bets if your team wins. That’s promo code TIRE at DraftKings Sportsbook — An Official Sports Betting Partner of Super Bowl Fifty Six. 

 

Want your question answered? Want to watch the live stream, get ad-free podcasts, or exclusive podcasts? Join our Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/thesmokingtirepodcast
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (James Engelsman, Thomas Holland)
